name: nangu.TV
overview:
nangu.TV represents a comprehensive solution for delivering Interactive TV services to anyone, anywhere.

Regardless if you are an ISP, Cable, Mobile, Hospitality TV Service provider or integrator, you will be able to create and deliver compelling services to your subscribers, who are using various devices (STB, PC or Mobile), through a manage network or Internet connection. nangu.TV platform also supports virtualization – hosting multiple companies on one platform while still retaining the unique look and feel or product parameters of each company. This enables the platform owner to launch wholesale Interactive TV operations in the cloud for a faster return on investment. Services for subscribers include:

Live TV VoD (Video on Demand) Non-linear TV features: PauseTV, StartOverTV, Network PVR/PVR, Timeshift Interactive applications including advertisement and on-line betting Access to the content from different devices, including STB, PC or Mobile Open environment for applications development and many more

The nangu.TV solution was developed in Prague, Czech Republic, where it has been under continuous development since 2003. nangu.TV is the brand name of Alnair a.s., the 100% intellectual property owner. Its solution or parts are used by major clients worldwide, including Swisscom Broadcast (Switzerland), Telefonica O2 Czech Republic, T-Systems Czech Republic, Caucasus OnLine (Georgia), SmartComp (Czech Republic), Slovanet (Slovakia) and others.
